long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ICHC Peer Fix Chrome extension resolves "peer connection failed" issues on icanhazchat.com caused by recent Chrome updates. It injects modified WebRTC scripts to restore video streaming functionality in Chrome 127 and other Chromium-based browsers (like Edge, Opera, and Brave). Using declarativeNetRequest, the extension blocks or redirects problematic site scripts, enabling seamless broadcasting without needing to downgrade or switch browsers.
